text:
We are using Enterprise CMS for one of our projects, and leveraging the membership functionality.
The membership process requires emails to be sent to set up a password etc.
However because technically emails are part of marketing hub the emails come through with hs branding on them.
As these emails are part of the integral features of Enterprise CMS this particular emails should not have the branding on them in my opinion
Wow.  Good catch Rohan.  I agree
Thanks a lot for reporting this! Definitely looks like an oversight. I’ve brought it up with the team
We have a fix for this on the way. I’ll update you when its out to production! Thanks again :sprocket-dance:
